articles.title: Shahid Afridi slams Pakistan's lackluster performance against Sri Lanka – Asia Cup 2023 - Cricket Times
articles.description: Sri Lanka defeated Pakistan by two wickets on Thursday and eliminated them from Asia Cup 2023. Shahid Afridi criticized the Babar Azam-led side's batting order choices.
